item.title: Sell Yourself Better 1.0
item.description: These are the slides for my Lightening UX Lisbon talk around User Experience people selling themselves better. There is a deeper focus on portfolios which are 80% bad in my experience, but not just for new jobs. See more at www.betteruxportfolios.com.

item.title: Amazon.com: the Hidden Empire
item.description: Reading this presentation will let you know everything about Amazon.com’s strategy; and discover how its three digital engines (enjoying no limits, owning customer accounts, building an ecosystem) helped it become Earth’s largest e-retailer. Follow us on Twitter: @faberNovel
item.content:encoded: Reading this presentation will let you know everything about Amazon.com’s strategy; and discover how its three digital engines (enjoying no limits, owning customer accounts, building an ecosystem) helped it become Earth’s largest e-retailer. Follow us on Twitter: @faberNovel
item.author: faberNovel@slideshare.net(faberNovel)

media:content.media:title: Amazon.com: the Hidden Empire
media:content.media:description:
Reading this presentation will let you know everything about Amazon.com's strategy; and discover how its three digital engines (enjoying no limits, owning customer accounts, building an ecosystem) helped it become Earth's largest e-retailer.
Follow us on Twitter: @faberNovel

item.title: 40 Social Mechanics for Social Games (Raph Koster)
item.description: Presentation given by game designer Raph Koster (not me, I’m only an admirer sharing the intelligence) at the Game Developers Conference in Austin (2011). Raph’s website: http://www.raphkoster.com Send him your congratulations here: http://www.raphkoster.com/contact.php More on how video games and advertising influence each other: http://www.flipflapwax.com

item.title: Social Media & Tourism: 10 Tips to Attract Travelers
item.description: The importance of using digital, social, mobile and emerging media to attract travelers to destinations is no secret. From overarching strategy to helpful tips and tricks, this presentation covers ways to energize locals to become brand evangelists and help fuel the flow of customers from out of town. This keynote was originally delivered Ben Grossman at Social Media Breakfast Greater Philly in partnership with Visit Bucks County in May 2011.
item.content:encoded: The importance of using digital, social, mobile and emerging media to attract travelers to destinations is no secret. From overarching strategy to helpful tips and tricks, this presentation covers ways to energize locals to become brand evangelists and help fuel the flow of customers from out of town. This keynote was originally delivered Ben Grossman at Social Media Breakfast Greater Philly in partnership with Visit Bucks County in May 2011.
item.author: bengrossman@slideshare.net(bengrossman)

media:content.media:title: Social Media & Tourism: 10 Tips to Attract Travelers

The importance of using digital, social, mobile and emerging media to attract travelers to destinations is no secret. From overarching strategy to helpful tips and tricks, this presentation covers ways to energize locals to become brand evangelists and help fuel the flow of customers from out of town.
This keynote was originally delivered Ben Grossman at Social Media Breakfast Greater Philly in partnership with Visit Bucks County in May 2011.
